span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要將事件與事件處理方法產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。To associate the event with your event-handling method, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理方法。The event-handling method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用監視類型事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type to monitor the event. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SystemEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/cpp/SystemEvents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SystemEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/CS/SystemEvents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/VB/SystemEvents.vb#1)]
